name: Peter World
description:
This is Peter World Game, a game similar to Mario World, which has a lot of
adventures, actions and good game-play.
Peter, a solitary character that you go through many adventures in
beautiful and great stages in a Pixel-Art open world.
We found the mule without head,
the werewolves, and many more terrible enemies ...
This is a fun game to play in your spare time, you will have a lot of fun,
besides contributing to a great game.

Peter World Beta ver 0.9.4
----------------------------------------------------
Help you to run the game for the first time
----------------------------------------------------
To Start A New Game,
enter your name in the Name field
and click the Start button.

To Load Saved Game
Select a NAME from the list of Saved Players
and click the Load button.

To Delete Saved Game
Select a NAME from the list of Saved Players
and click the Delete button.

Use Arrows keys to move the Peter
Use Up or W keys to open chests
F key to attack or to use selected item
Use keys from 1 to 5 to select weapons and attacks
Space key to Jump
Double Space key to double jump
F key to use selected item
Tab key to show/hide menu game
Use Mouse to navigate menu game
M key to show/hide game map
Esc to main menu
